item.title: [help] "click to continue" dont work

item.description:
@thijs_d wrote:

[quote=“Drunk On Java, post:1, topic:4213”]er ill give u me dialog i got for a guy, when i click here to continue it just says please wait and does nothing this is for all npcs know how to fix?

case 8: sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884); sendFrame126("Purify this cave, and treasure will be waiting.", 4885); sendMessage("The Mysterious Old Man then hands you some magic turtles."); addItem(398, 100); teleportToX = 2895; teleportToY = 9908; sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; //RemoveAllWindows(); break; [/quote] same problem here :S

item.title: [help] "click to continue" dont work

item.description:
@Drunk_On_Java wrote:

er ill give u me dialog i got for a guy, when i click here to continue it just says please wait and does nothing this is for all npcs know how to fix?

			case 8:
				sendFrame200(4883, 591);
				sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4884);
				sendFrame126("Purify this cave, and treasure will be waiting.", 4885);
				sendMessage("The Mysterious Old Man then hands you some magic turtles.");				
				addItem(398, 100);
                  		teleportToX = 2895;
                		teleportToY = 9908;
				sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4883);
				sendFrame164(4882);
				NpcDialogueSend = true;
                                //RemoveAllWindows();
